title: The book every electronics nerd should own #shorts
description:
I just received my preorder copy of Open Circuits, a new book put out by No Starch Press. And I don't normally post about the books I buy, but THIS book is amazing. Anyone who likes electronics, computers, or engineering should consider picking up a copy.

Seeing inside each component gives me a new understanding when I'm breadboarding or prototyping a circuit design—and why some components tend to fail more easily than others!

You can pre-order it on Amazon: https://amzn.to/3fHTtKT (I bought mine directly from No Starch Press months ago, and they just started shipping it out to the early buyers this week)

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/geerlingguy
Sponsor me on GitHub: https://github.com/sponsors/geerlingguy
